summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackBubble's First Class Oil Cleanser easily breaks down oil-based products, like makeup and SPF. This lightweight oil formula transforms into a milky texture when rinsed off with water, leaving you with soft, makeup-free skin. Use First Class on its own or as the first step in a luxe double cleanse.
details: DetailsBenefitsLeaves skin feeling nourished and calmIdeal for dry/sensitive skinBreaks down oil-based products for a thorough cleanseKey IngredientsSunflower Seed Oil helps to dissolve makeup.Rosehip Seed Oil is rich in vitamins and essential fatty acids to help nourish skin.Prickly Pear Oil is highly moisturizing, rich in antioxidants, and helps to protect skin.Formulated WithoutDenatured alcoholsArtificial colorAdded fragranceParabensItem 2626622How To UseMassage into dry skin with dry hands for 30 seconds to break down makeup, SPF, and other products. Rinse well. Oil will transform into a milky texture when combined with water. Pat dry.IngredientsHelianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isopropyl Palmitate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Squalane, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Water (Aqua), Canola Oil, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Seed Oil, Betula Alba Bark Extract, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Massage into dry skin with dry hands for 30 seconds to break down makeup, SPF, and other products. Rinse well. Oil will transform into a milky texture when combined with water. Pat dry.

reviews.headline: No, I would not buy it hearing about reviews from my friends
reviews.comments: No, because I have had friends who bought it and they're skin became red and burning.

reviews.headline: this cleanser is amazing
reviews.comments: I just started to use this like a month ago and my skin has cleared up so much because it get all of the dirt and stuff out of your skin it amazing go get it now!

reviews.headline: Better Choices Out There
reviews.comments: I love Bubble products but this one missed the mark for me. I felt like it didnt give me a deep clean compared to other oil cleansers, just kind of sat on top of my face. May be suited for people with very sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Feels like rubbing glue on your face
reviews.comments: It is almost impossible to use this without water, it feels like rubbing glue on your face. Not into it!

reviews.headline: Broke me out really badly
reviews.comments: I bought this product when it first came out, and after ONE NIGHT of using it, my face was covered in little red zits. I mean everywhere. I have dry, non-acne prone skin, and this was the worst breakout I have ever had. I double cleansed correctly too, following the exact directions on the website and in YouTube reviews. I tried it twice, and both times, I woke up covered in red pimples. I looked at the ingredients, and one of the most concentrated is  Isopropyl Palmitate, which is a BIG pore clogger apparently. I wouldn't try this if you have skin, regardless of skin type, period. Love bubble, but this one failed me ðŸ˜”

reviews.headline: not for me
reviews.comments:
disclaimer: everybody's skin is different. This didn't work for me and my needs.

Context: I don't really use this as makeup remover, except for mascara and brow gel. I use it on my combination skin to wash off oil at the end of the day.

This cleanser took the oil off my skin, but I didn't feel like it did much beyond that. My ideal oil cleanser penetrates the subaceous filaments on my nose, and I didn't feel like I got that here, even after like ~2 minutes of massaging it in. 
My other qualm is that this formula is somehow super dry? It has very minimal slip so I need 2-3 pumps, and it somehow still feels almost gritty. 

It does wash off super well and doesn't seem to have fragrance, so if you're looking for a topical wash, this would be good for you.

reviews.headline: Retuned it.
reviews.comments: Formula is not smooth enough to use dry. Drags on the skin a lot more than other oil cleansers do. It emulsified fine and didn't smell strong. But as a standalone product, it was not very nice to use. You can find other cleansers with more product, and better quality at the same price.

reviews.headline: Sensitive skin friendly
reviews.comments: This slippery oil wont burn your eyes or cause any irritation. But it also isn't effective for oil cleansing. This did not feel like it removed my makeup. The consistency is too watery alone, but doesnt froth up when water is incorporated either. I wanted to love this but it really just didn't do anything for me.

reviews.headline: Dupe for Tatcha Camellia Cleansing Oil!
reviews.comments: I have been obsessed with the Camellia Cleansing Oil from Tatcha for yearsâ€¦ but it is INSANELY expensive. I found this cleansing oil from Bubble after trying so many different oils and balmsâ€¦ I will never go back!! I love this stuff. It takes all of my makeup off, just as good as the Camellia cleansing oil does and rinses off perfectly with no residue. Love!

reviews.headline: new formula??
reviews.comments: got my first bottle a while back and I loved it cause the consistency was thin so it was fast and easy to remove my makeup but I recently repurchased it and the consistency is much thicker now, I feel like I'm slathering used motor oil on my face :( I will still keep this bottle cause I need it and it gets the job done but would love to have the old formula

reviews.headline: I would consider buying again
reviews.comments: It's a nice product for its price. There are a few other options out there I prefer because it does a better job at removing my mascara, but they're more expensive.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: I was pleasantly surprised by this product! As someone with combination skin, I've struggled with stubborn blackheads and large pores for a long time. I've tried numerous solutions to get rid of them, but nothing workedâ€”until now! After applying this product to my face and rubbing it in for a few minutes, I could see my blackheads and sebaceous pores starting to purge. I left it on my skin for about 10 to 15 minutes, continuing to massage it in. After just three days of using this product, my skin has never looked clearer or felt so soft.

reviews.headline: not for makeup
reviews.comments: this cleanser is so thick and even a little hard to pump out. it has zero slip! i tried removing a full face of makeup and it was really rough on my skin and especially terrible on my waterproof makeup. i think it even damaged my lashes a little. i need an oil cleanser that easily melts everything right off. that being said, i did use it on a bare face just for cleansing and it did make my skin really soft. ill finish the bottle using it that way but i wont purchase again

reviews.headline: It doesn't remove mascara
reviews.comments: I recently purchased this and a few other Bubble products while they were 30% and sadly this was a fail for me. I love the packaging and price point but it doesn't remove  mascara at all. It also left an oily residue so you have to double cleanse.

reviews.headline: Wanted to love itâ€¦
reviews.comments: This cleansing oil is fine for days I dont wear makeup for a first cleanse. It is a thick oil with minimum to no slip so it is very hard to properly cleanse. Additionally, even after adding water it barely turns into a "milky texture" as the directions state. It did a horrible job of removing mascara and required 8+ pumpe to fully remove foundation, concealer, etc. Two stars because I will use it until it's gone, but i would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Helped me start double cleansing
reviews.comments: This oil cleanser is one of the best products I have ever used on my face. It feels like it really gets into my skin and cleanses it out and leaves it smooth, even before I use my second cleanser.

reviews.headline: The worst cleansing oil I've ever tried
reviews.comments: This is probably a great oil cleanser if you're 14 and only wear concealer. This is a terrible oil cleanser if you're an adult and you wear a full face of makeup. I have to use about 10 pumps just to get enough of the product out, and it doesn't remove waterproof mascara. I know Bubble is meant for preteens and teens, but the price point was hard to pass up.

reviews.headline: 100% recommended trying
reviews.comments: Love this product!

reviews.headline: Doesn't burn your eyes!!
reviews.comments: I have tried a lot of oil cleansers to remove makeup and double cleanse my skin. This one is so amazing especially considering the price!!! It is so easy to emulsify and gently breaks down makeup and unclogs your pores, leaving your skin feeling extremely hydrated and not stripped!! It also does not burn your eyes or get super cloudy as most oil cleansers do when they get in your eyes!! I was so pleasantly surprised with this product!

reviews.headline: AMAZING! GREAT FOR 9 YEAR OLDS
reviews.comments: So I bought this for my little sis She loves skin care! And she loves this brand! I got her this and her skin looks amazing !!! I recommended her this brand because she's new to skin care! She This and the fresh start!

media.headline: I loved this product!!
media.caption: My quality isn't very good, very sorry.

media.headline: New Oil Cleanser
media.caption: Bubble Skincare First Class Oil Cleanser

media.headline: I love the product so much
media.caption: This is mee

media.headline: I would definitely buy this! It's so soft on my skin.
media.caption: So cute too!

faceoff_positive.comments: In a world where self-care is essential, the "first class" bubble cleanser stands out as a beacon of luxury and indulgence. With its rich lather and gentle formula, it transforms a mundane skincare routine into a spa-like experience. From the moment the bubbles touch your skin, you are transported to a realm of relaxation and rejuvenation. The subtle scent lingers delicately, creating a calming atmosphere that soothes both the body and the soul. Each cleanse is not just a task, but a ritual of self-love and pampering. The "first class" bubble cleanser is more than just a product; it is a gateway to a world where every day feels like a retreat.The "first class" bubble cleanser exudes elegance with its sleek packaging and sophisticated design. The clear bottle showcases the luxurious bubbles within, inviting you to experience its cleansing power. As you dispense the cleanser, the texture is velvety smooth, creating a rich lather that gently envelops your skin in a cloud of softness. The bubbles feel light and airy, yet effectively cleanse and refresh, leaving your skin feeling pampered and revitalized. The look is amazing
faceoff_positive.headline: No more dry

My other qualm is that this formula is somehow super dry? It has very minimal slip so I need 2-3 pumps, and it somehow still feels almost gritty.
